tool_description: Generates personalized customer notifications for shipping updates, delivery confirmations, and exceptions based on templates and customer preferences.

notification_type.description: Type of notification: shipped, in_transit, delivered, delayed, exception

tracking_number.description: Tracking number to include in notification

exception_details.description: Details about delivery exceptions or delays

template_id.description: Specific template ID to use for notification

include_tracking_link.description: Whether to include carrier tracking link

language_preference.description: Customer language preference (en, es, fr, etc.)

error_messages: Customer not found: The specified customer_id does not exist in the system.
Order not found: The specified order_id does not exist for this customer.
Invalid notification type: Must be one of [shipped, in_transit, delivered, delayed, exception].
Template not found: The specified template_id does not exist.
Invalid urgency level: Must be one of [low, medium, high].
Missing required data: exception_details required for exception notification type.
Invalid language: Language preference not supported.
usage: Provide customer_id, order_id, and notification_type. Include relevant optional parameters based on notification type and desired personalization level.

message_subject.description: Generated subject line for the notification

recommended_channels.description: Recommended delivery channels based on urgency and preferences
